spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout discrepancies. The central staircase and hall are replaced with a generic office/hallway. The dining room and kitchen separation is inverted; the window seat alcove is missing entirely. Door placement in the central core does not match the architectural plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls are present and roof is removed, but the floor plan has been fundamentally reinterpreted. The staircase (UP) in the original plan is non-existent in the render. Walls have been hallucinated to create additional small cubicles not present in the blueprint.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is low-poly but incorrectly mapped. The kitchen appliances (sink, stove, fridge) are not properly represented in their designated zones. Bedroom/utility furniture is placed based on hallucinated walls rather than the provided plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The render successfully captures the requested low-poly, flat-colored aesthetic. Soft ambient lighting is well-executed on a dark neutral background with an orthographic isometric camera. Only minor deductions for slight shadow gradients.

detected_errors.description: Missing central staircase and window seat alcove.
Kitchen and dining area proportions and wall alignments are significantly distorted.
Hallucinated interior partitions and office-like cubicle structures not present in the 2D plan.
